name: Everlasting Abundance
description:
Everlasting Abundance (the game) is set in a dystopian future where a AAA game company controls everything and pushes its predatory practices like loot boxes and forced gambling into the everyday lives of people. You play as an orphan teenager, and along with your little sister Kiyoko and your childhood friend Mirai, you will need to break out of your daily routine and join a faction of independent rebels called the Circle in order to try to defeat Everlasting Abundance (the regime). However, ushering in a new era of freedom isn't as easy as 1-2-3. Conflicts will arise. Tears will be shed. Meat & potatoes will be eaten. And the flowers will grow back... Probably.

This game is 3 to 4 hours long, has 4 different endings and an original soundtrack (heavily influenced by classic JRPG music). It also has a Story Mode if you want to breeze through the combat and mostly experience the narrative.

Pride & Accomplishment!
